methods.name: bootstrap
methods.desc: Bootstrap the pool by assigning assets and weights, create the LP tokens

args.name: weights
args.desc:
weights of the pool
 uint64 - LP Token created ID

methods.name: addLiquidity
methods.desc: Provide one token liquidity to the pool

args.name: index
args.desc: index of the token in the pool

methods.name: getLiquidity
methods.desc:
Compute the liquidity for the given sender based on the state
in the contract
